script: Can I have your attention please? Bus 2-3-4 from Salt Lake City, scheduled in 10 minutes, is stalled just outside the city limits. A new bus is en route to transport passengers, and is expected to be here in about an hour. We apologize for the delay. Meanwhile, passengers waiting for bus 234 to Las Vegas and Los Angeles are invited to have a free meal in our lounge. Show your boarding pass at the dining counter to receive lunch and a beverage, on us. If you are a 234 passenger planning to catch connecting buses in Las Vegas or Los Angeles, we are phoning those stations and trying to arrange for extra buses to meet you to avoid further delays. We apologize again for this inconvenience. Please note that our buses arrive and depart on schedule more than 90 percent of the time. If you would like a refund due to this postponement, please take your boarding pass to the customer service desk in the back of the station.
